effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

Transmogrified to:
Tropical Sunrise Halter Top

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 4.7 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, a fuse is flipped to prevent a hazardous outcome.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Wristclamps of Mad Dreams

Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,251 and Haste by 8,382.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 326,178, and Strength by 8,196.

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 6,609 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 307,479 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,559 Strength and absorbing 1.5 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)
